title: Can't back up the seed phrase, stuck on step 3
body: On the last step when Im going to verify the 2nd word, when Im clicking next , i am prompted to enter the same info endlessly. Version: beta.8.rc3 StatusDesktop/v0.72.1/darwin-amd64/go1.13.4 **Version:** `beta.8`

@richard-ramos nothing special in terminal, just a loop when entering last word:
